item.title: Sponsorship Levels
item.author: Collin
item.description: Today we are restructuring our sponsorship levels and our sponsor site! Our sponsors will have a better representation of their company and an easy way for new companies to sponsor us!

item.title: Argosy Grant Lessons Learned
item.author: Mrs. Medd
item.description: As a part of the Argosy grant we earned in our rookie season, we were asked to post some of our lessons learned to help future rookie teams to be successful. Here is our advice.

item.title: Kelseys KICKBACK Night
item.author: Ben Helleman
item.description: FRC6854 is hosting a KICKBACK Night at Kelseys North London on February 19 from 4:30pm to 10:00pm. See Mr. Helleman at A.B.Lucas or email frc6854@gotvdsb.ca to obtain a card. We will recieve 20% of all food sales for the night minus alcohol sales. Mark your calendars and encourage your family and friends to attend! Takout is as good as dine-in with a card.

item.title: New Website
item.author: Collin
item.description: This is our new and improved website. Add this to your bookmarks for the latest news from the team!
